topic.domains: (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
topic.title: Drug Monitoring Act - conformance rules

section.p:
This template represents the act of monitoring the patient's medication and includes a participation to record the person responsible for monitoring the medication. The prescriber of the medication is not necessarily the same person or persons monitoring the drug. The effectiveTime indicates the time when the activity is intended to take place.
For example, a cardiologist may prescribe a patient Warfarin. The patient's primary care provider may monitor the patient's INR and adjust the dosing of the Warfarin based on these lab results. Here the person designated to monitor the drug is the primary care provider.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-28657, CONF:1098-28658 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.123"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1098-30823)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-31920)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-28660)/@code="395170001" medication monitoring (regime/therapy) (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:1098-30818, CONF:1098-30819)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-31921), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ActStatus 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.159331 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32358)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] participant such that it (CONF:1098-28661)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RESP" (CONF:1098-28663)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:1098-28662)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ASSIGNED" (CONF:1098-28664)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-28665)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingEntity such that it (CONF:1098-28667)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PSN" (CONF:1098-28668)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:1098-28669)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1098-30823)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-31920)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-28660)/@code="395170001" medication monitoring (regime/therapy) (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:1098-30818, CONF:1098-30819)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-31921), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ActStatus 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.159331 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32358)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] participant such that it (CONF:1098-28661)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RESP" (CONF:1098-28663)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:1098-28662)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ASSIGNED" (CONF:1098-28664)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-28665)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingEntity such that it (CONF:1098-28667)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PSN" (CONF:1098-28668)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:1098-28669)

body.codeblock: <act xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="ACT" moodCode="INT"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.123"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="189882612"/> <code code="395170001" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT" displayName="medication monitoring (regime/therapy)"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <participant typeCode="RESP"> <participantRole classCode="ASSIGNED"> <id root="MDHT" extension="1379801330"/> <playingEntity classCode="PSN"/> </participantRole> </participant> </act>
